body: @OneOfOne The queue is still not FIFO after 2f9d3a217eadbc557e758649fa153dd59ff14c11 and len still can return -1. You can block and unblock goroutines without runtime support, sync.Mutex+Cond can block/unblock goroutines. You can stab runtime scheduler by implementing 2 functions on top of Mutex+Cond: park(g *G) and unpark(g *G).
